parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
From asthenes; feebleness; by implication, malady; morally, frailty.

str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
